: Series synopsis/PLOT :

A story about a group of young people who form a bond because of table tennis. In trying to find the truth from 20 years ago, they become instrumental to reigniting the glory of Tengyuan. Yan Xiao Xi is a gifted table tennis player, taught by her foster father who was a master in the sport. When she transfers to Tengyuan College, it is only a matter of time before her talent is discovered by Qi Jing Hao, the handsome leader of the Tengyuan Ping Pong club.
